parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Instantly, immediately, on the spot. From para and chrema; at the thing itself, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make upright (straight) again, rear again, restore. From ana and a derivative of the base of orthos; to straighten up.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
